articles.title: John King: Nancy Pelosi calling BS on Mitch McConnell
articles.description: CNN's John King discusses House Speaker Nancy Pelosi calling out Sen. Mitch McConnell for his reasoning behind why he voted not guilty in former President Trump's second impeachment hearing.

articles.author: Analysis by Harry Enten, CNN
articles.title: Why most GOP senators are standing by Trump
articles.description: A lot of critics of former President Donald Trump want GOP senators to "show some spine." They think the big reason they have stayed with Trump through impeachment is because they're scared of him.

articles.title: This is Trump's heaping list of legal problems post-impeachment
articles.description: After averting a conviction in his second impeachment trial, former President Donald Trump faces significant new legal threats as prosecutors in Georgia have joined those in New York to conduct criminal investigations into his actions.

articles.title: Dallas police officer directing traffic killed by suspected drunk driver
articles.description: A 32-year-old man was charged with intoxication manslaughter after a car he was driving allegedly struck and killed a Dallas police officer who was blocking the scene of an earlier accident on an expressway, police said.
